item.description:
Central CT Singles invites you to Extreme Neon Bowling with Half-Price Games!

Saturday, December 22 at 8 pm

Bowl 2 games for only $9 (including shoes)

Free Pool and Darts * Prizes * Drink Specials

Join us for the party and meet local singles at the Legends Lounge in:

AMF Bowling Center
748 Silver Lane
East Hartford, CT 06118
Phone: (860) 569-2990

We will have music, movies on the big screen, FREE Pool and Darts, gift certificates, and lots of prizes!

RSVP Today on Central CT Singles Click Here


Tickets are only $15
item.how_to_find_us: Look for us in the black CTNites.com VIP entertainment Clubber T-Shirts
item.why: Meet Local Singles and have fun at this event!

group.name: Connecticut Theatre Group Arts-Theater Events Group Discount

item.name: Central CT Singles - Half-Price Bowling and FREE Pool in East Hartford
